lessonTopics: Lesson 1: Life Coaching Foundation - What life coaching is, the difference from therapy, 5 core areas of transformation, scope of practice
Lesson 2: The B.R.I.D.G.E. Method - Believe, Reveal, Identify, Design, Grow, Elevate framework for systematic life transformation coaching
Lesson 3: Getting Your First Clients - Warm market strategy, pricing packages, income math, 30-day launch plan
painPoints: Feeling stuck in a life that looks good on paper but feels empty inside
Playing small because taking big risks feels too scary at this stage of life
People-pleasing everyone else while ignoring their own needs and dreams
Lost sense of identity after kids grew up, divorce, or major career change
Knowing they're capable of more but not knowing how to get there
Helping friends and family with life decisions for free but no framework or income
terminology: Limiting beliefs - unconscious thoughts that hold people back from their full potential
B.R.I.D.G.E. Method - Believe, Reveal, Identify, Design, Grow, Elevate framework
5 Core Areas - Career/Purpose, Relationships, Health/Wellness, Personal Growth, Financial Freedom
Vision casting - helping clients articulate what they truly want for their lives
Accountability partnership - structured support system to ensure follow-through on goals
Breakthrough session - pivotal moment when client overcomes a major mental block
Scope of practice - facilitate life goals and transformation without diagnosing or treating mental illness
clientExamples: Women 40-55 going through major life transitions (divorce, empty nest, career change)
Corporate professionals who feel successful but unfulfilled in their current path
Moms whose identity was wrapped up in their kids and now feel lost
Women recovering from toxic relationships who need to rediscover who they are
Anyone who describes feeling stuck, playing small, or knowing there's more to life
practiceType: Life coaching focused on goal-setting, vision work, accountability, mindset transformation, and personal breakthrough sessions
